programme.title: Managing Asia
programme.desc: Christine Tan heads to Hong Kong to talk to Irene Lee, chairman of Hysan Development, one of the city's largest property developers. She finds out how the century-old family business began and how it came to dominate the commercial real estate space in Causeway Bay.

programme.title: Sustainable Future
programme.desc: Can Nuclear energy be the solution to combatting the climate crisis? A new documentary, "Nuclear Now", makes the case for atomic energy.

programme.title: The Score
programme.desc: Aucune description

programme.title: The Brave Ones
programme.desc: A Sudanese-British billionaire businessman that is using his wealth and profile to push for better governance in Africa. Mo Ibrahim's story is a true brave one from his beginnings as a telecom engineer to a globally recognized philanthropist comparable to Alfred Nobel or Joseph Pulitzer. In this episode a host of famous faces, from Bono to Mary Robinson, tell his story.

programme.title: Leading the Way
programme.sub-title: Growing In Your Love For Jesus Part 3
programme.desc: Michael Youssef provides enlightening truth to viewers around the world with his eye-opening interpretations of God's Word. Demonstrating the power of the Almighty through his own experiences, Dr. Youssef invokes a strong, tangible connection to His Message, and reveals how we as Christians can better ourselves and those around his with a faith-based approach to life.

programme.title: Answers with Bayless Conley
programme.sub-title: Love Your Woman, Respect Your Man (Part 2)
programme.desc: In part two of "Love Your Woman, Respect Your Man," Pastor Bayless Conley explores what every man's heart needs.

programme.title: In Touch Ministries
programme.desc: In Touch Ministries is a long-running television series in which senior pastor of the First Baptist Church in Atlanta, Dr Charles Stanley, shares lessons about the Christian faith. He discusses various themes, such as family, prayer, motherhood and fear, addressing stories from the Bible and offering a deeper understanding of Christian teachings. Join him as he explains what faith means in modern day life, and why it is necessary for finding inner peace.

programme.title: Joseph Prince
programme.desc: Religious programme hosted by Joseph Prince. Prince is the senior pastor and co-founder of the New Creation Church in Singapore - a large non-denominational Christian church in Asia. This programme features Prince's spiritual messages on life and faith, sermons, his religious interpretations and words of praise and worship. With his energetic and sometimes humorous style, Joseph Prince has spoken to audiences across the world. His words are broadcast globally across North America, Europe, Africa, and Australia. He is also the author of numerous religious and spiritual books.

programme.title: Joel Osteen
programme.desc: Hear the messages of hope that best-selling author, evangelist and the senior pastor of Lakewood Church in Houston, Joel Osteen is delivering in each episode. Joel's positive and encouraging speeches will allow viewers to hear God's message of hope, love and victory and be inspired to do great things in life. Joel tries to teach Biblical principles in a simple way, always highlighting the power and importance of love and positive thinking.

programme.title: Secret Lives of the Super Rich
programme.sub-title: Vegas' Most Expensive Mansion & The $100.000 Facial
programme.desc: Double down on the most expensive mansion in Sin City. Travel to a renowned watchmaker's French chateau to check out his latest $800,000 creation as well as his personal racecar collection. See why Kim Kardashian and Beyoncé swear by the L.A. dermatologist behind the $100,000 full-body facial. Savor a $135,000 bottle of cognac, a rare collaboration from France's finest artisans. Get wet and wild in a $2.5M backyard water park modeled after an extravagant Bahamian resort. Take a new spin on a classic with the legendary GT-40's that are inspiring a new line of supercars. Find out which billionaire businessman transported his dragon-inspired mansion half-way around the world. Rack up a six-figure bill with the custom pool tables that celebrities can't get enough of.

programme.title: La fièvre du dollar
programme.desc: Carlos Perez-Olivo is a successful lawyer with a silver tongue and solid gold taste. But when he's disbarred for fleecing desperate clients, he finds another way to make money…and proves how greed really is a deadly sin.

programme.title: Golf : Open de la Nouvelle-Orléans
programme.desc: PGA TOUR 2022/2023. Zurich Classic of New Orleans.

programme.title: Meet the Press
programme.desc: American current affairs programme with indepth interviews and roundtable discussion and analysis. The world's longest running television show interviews key players from the worlds of politics, economics, foreign affairs and other areas of public interest. With 13 moderators over its 70 years of broadcasting, it has interviewed the world's most important politicians and political players.

programme.title: Managing Asia
programme.desc: Christine Tan speaks exclusively to Kuehne+Nagel's CEO, Stefan Paul, to find out how he plans to grow the Swiss-based transportation and logistics group.

programme.title: Marketing.Media.Money
programme.desc: One of the biggest banks in Southeast Asia is branding itself as a tech start-up. CNBC brings you behind the strategy of DBS, on the next episode of Marketing.Media.Money.

programme.title: La fièvre du dollar
programme.desc: Dr. Mark Weinberger-a self-proclaimed "nose doctor"-has it all and isn't afraid to flaunt it. But inside The Weinberger Sinus Clinic, all is not what it seems.

programme.title: La fièvre du dollar
programme.desc: Kenneth Ira Starr is a money manager. He courts celebrity client—Sylvester Stallone, Uma Thurman, and Wesley Snipes. But Starr doesn't stop there. He steals $30 million to buy his way onto Hollywood's A-list and live a life of luxury … all in the name of love.

programme.title: Managing Asia
programme.desc: Neste Finnish refinery group, Neste, has built the world's largest sustainable aviation fuel production plant in Singapore. Christine Tan speaks to Neste's President and CEO, Matti Lehmus, to find out more about the company's renewable fuel strategy and whether he has plans to wind down its traditional crude oil refinery business.

programme.title: CNBC Conversation
programme.desc: He's been described as the father of India's IT sector. N.R. Narayana Murthy, the Founder of one of the largest IT companies in the country, Infosys, sits down for The CNBC Conversation.

programme.title: La fièvre du dollar
programme.desc: Carlos Perez-Olivo is a successful lawyer with a silver tongue and solid gold taste. But when he's disbarred for fleecing desperate clients, he finds another way to make money…and proves how greed really is a deadly sin.

programme.title: La fièvre du dollar
programme.desc: Nevin Shapiro is the conman at the center of a college football scandal. He kicked off the controversy with stunning stories of gifts to players and allegations of broken NCAA rules. Who is this man who jeopardized the future of the University of Miami's football team, and how did he steal the millions that made it all possible?
